name: Beekin
slogan: Data analytics for Real estate landlords
description:
Beekin's product allows owners of apartments and offices to set lease prices, optimise marketing spends, and understand and learn more about their residents. 

This allows more income by reducing vacancy and churn (not higher rents!), and happy residents. Its a win-win for both investors and renters. 

The tool is built on Beekin's AI Engine, which is trained on 200 million datapoints around rent, tenants and space.
marketTags: B2B · SaaS · Mobile · Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.description:
PERSON SPEC 

You will be an engineer.
You can review code to transform noisy real-world data into high-signal models that stand the test of time.

You will be a storyteller.
You will communicate your insights in a way that resonates with your partners — including Beekin’s leadership — to turn theory into action. The story of our business is often a complex one to tell, so you must craft your message to help your audience understand and engage.

You will be an entrepreneur.
You will come to understand the nature of how real estate operates, and proactively identify new areas of investment for the business.


RESPONSIBILITIES

Own the design and development of our RESTful APIs, ETL pipelines, and data warehouse

Act as a technical mentor to developers & machine learning engineers

Work closely with our product and sales on both prototyping and iterative development


QUALIFICATIONS

B.S. in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, or equivalent experience

2-5 years of work experience in Javascript, Python with a strong understanding of current tools, best practices, and debugging methodologies

Expertise developing RESTful APIs

Ability to work smoothly with other engineers, product managers, and designers

Systematic problem solving approach, coupled with a strong sense of ownership and drive

Familiarity with CI/CD build tools and techniques, including one or more of the following: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, CircleCI

Familiarity with one or more of the following database and document store technologies: Postgresql, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, Amazon S3

Familiarity with various products in the AWS ecosystem and AWS cloud infrastructure

Familiarity with queueing or message-brokering technologies


GREAT TO HAVE 

Experience with functional programming 
Experience in financial markets and related services

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description:
Beekin is looking to hire a data scientist to it's team. The team comprises PhDs in statistics and computer scientists from prominent universities and more importantly, focused on making a real world impact with models that are robust, unbiased and scalable. 

In a short period of time, the Beekin data science team has established itself as a leader in the US real estate market, against sizeable competitors. The data scientist can be a full time or internship role, located in Berlin. 

Required 
- Strong Python skills, particularly ML relevant libraries 
- Experience with statistics / mathematics 
- Undergraduate degree in Computer Science, Math or Statistics 

Good to have 
- Experience with spatial temporal data 
- Understanding of AWS / Git

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
The position

Beekin is looking to hire a sales professional, who will be responsible for prospecting . This is a truly entrepreneurial role, as a first external business hire with future P&L responsibility at an early stage. The position can be based in NY or London.  

In partnership with the CEO, the SDR will be responsible for finding relationships, partnerships and clients. This will involve developing a relationship with investors, lenders, syndicate groups and positioning Beekin as a pre-eminent AI company. 

You will be given direct ownership of a key area for Beekin, and will deliver meaningful change, which will be the primary measure of your success. 
 
Person Specification

You will think like an engineer.

You can appreciate code that transforms noisy real-world data into high-signal models that stand the test of time.

You will be a storyteller.
You will communicate Beekin insights in a way that resonates with your partners — including Beekin’s leadership — to turn theory into action. The story of our business is often a complex one to tell, so you must craft your message to help your audience understand and engage.

You will be an entrepreneur.
You will come to understand the nature of how real estate operates, and proactively identify new areas of investment for the business.


Required skills:

Prior B2B and Enterprise Sales Experience 
Familiarity with CRM (Pipedrive, Hubspot)
Prospecting experience and ability to cold-call 
Desire to succeed 
Confident and articulate 
Get S*** done

Nice to have:
Design or UI skills 
Experience in Fintech or a Data Company 

Beekin Values
The Beekin team is a motley group who all share the following traits. 

Ambitious - There's a $217 trillion market to conquer

Always learning - polymaths will rule the world

Collaborative - we grow when we all grow

Work hard -the earth moved 4.6km in the time you read this, can you move fast

Humility - A prima donna exists in arts, not science
